question: Which space agency has successfully launched the RamanSat 2 miniature satellite?
explanation: NASA has successfully launched the RamanSat 2 miniature satellite designed by 17-year-old Indian student Aabhaas Sikka. The satellite was developed by Sikka during his internship with SPACE India with help from SPACE Group Founder and CMD Sachin Bahmba along with the company\'s research team. It is carrying equipment to measure the radiation from Sun and space.
